attributes.title: Read😔
attributes.review: So i was playing my assassins creeed game and realized the trump expansion pack wasn’t available and got real upset and realized if I throw myself at him like sonic the hedgehog he’ll drop all his money and then i can create it myself however this app harassed me and violated me and im a minor so im scared and waiting for trump to pay me off with $4,000,000

attributes.title: Don’t download this app
attributes.review: Don’t recommend this app as it is very glitchy and just impossible to navigate. The moment I downloaded it I knew something was wrong. Don’t waste your time on this app. Horrible things started happening to me after I downloaded it. Dont even want to talk about it. BEWARE

attributes.title: Worst app EVER
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking it was going to give me great stuff. It made my phone slow down. It’s worse that the Pence app. This app is TRASH just like the Cheeto Man. I’m so disappointed. This app is lucky I’m even giving it a ONE STAR! I feel like a Karen right now about how upset I am. Worse decision ever. I wanna speak to the manager behind this app. Ew.

attributes.title: Trump is stupid and so is this trump app
attributes.review: this app is so stupid plus trump is stupid and racist i hate him with all my guts he is ignorant and is only doing bad for this country he hasn’t done anything good for the country only make it worse and make allies enemies and he is also trying to take down tiktok😤 Gen-Z don’t go down without a fight

attributes.title: This ain't it !
attributes.review: As soon as opened this app it started to glitch like crazy ! As soon as I tried to open it, the app automatically closed. Like what ??? I'm very disappointed Trump...I ain't surprised though, you can't even run America correctly so why am I surprised this app don't run right either 🤨🤨🤨. Very disappointed...

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: Truly and deeply disappointed, all i wanted to do was support my favorite president...the app basically crashed my phone😓 Now i’m getting a bunch of pop ups, I didn’t even know that could happen to an iPhone. 0/10 would definitely not recommend to a friend!

attributes.title: My phone is broken now 😣
attributes.review: I was excited to download this app for our 45th president and then it went pitch black my phone has been blasting my little pony for the longest it finally stopped like i’m honestly so disappointed thanks for nothing I guess. Like I just can’t deal with this anymore I’m so UNHAPPY  I hate it here.

attributes.title: THIS APP CAUSED MY DOGS SISTERS COUSINS BEST FRIEND TO DIE
attributes.review: Yup. She just dropped dead after she opened this app👩🏼➡️❌👄❌. I think it caused my phone to turn into an a nuclear bomb🤯😔. Scary stuff. Not to mention that once my phone exploded it put itself back together then started to sing Marilyn Monroe by Danielle Cohen😰😰. While bellowing the song it burrowed up my booty hole and turned into a nuclear bomb again🧗⭕️➡️💣!! I HAVE A NUCLEAR BOMB INSIDE OF ME RIGHT NOW THANKS TO THIS APP.

attributes.title: No🤢!!
attributes.review: I tried downloading the app 3 times before it allowed me to but it took a whole week and then when i finally downloaded it it took 8hours loading to even get it open and when i finnaly got it open my phone caught a virus like come on i just wanted to support my lovely president😑

attributes.title: Don’t even waste your time
attributes.review: I opened the app trying to make America great again but as I was about to do it I remembered that this orange excuse for a man has done nothing but made America worse so I decided to leave a bad review ya know some babies were dropped on their head but it’s obvious here that trump was thrown at the wall :) #notmyPresident
